Whether you're looking to upgrade an older home battery backup system or want to check out a new model for the first time, Bluetti has you covered. These giant batteries and inverters can keep your devices powered through any storm, on the road, or at the campsite, letting users go off grid.

Bluetti specializes in whole home power backup systems and a range of portable power stations. They are a very compelling solution and utilize the latest features and technologies you'd expect from a premium portable power station brand.

Get up to 57% off of Bluetti's top models through Black Friday, and save even more with an exclusive coupon for AppleInsider readers. Use APPLEBFDAY on the Bluetti website and Amazon for an additional 5% off of the following Black Friday deals.

Best overall portable power station: Bluetti Elite 200V2

The Bluetti Elite 200V2 is built with automotive-grade LiFePO4 that has a 6,000 charge cycles rating — that translates to more than 17 years of daily use. Whether you plan to use it at home during a power outage or in your RV, you'll never worry about losing power.

Bluetti Elite 200V2

With its 2,073.6Wh capacity and 2,600W output, the Elite 200V2 can handle your iPhone, Mac, or large appliance. Its compact size is its superpower, taking up 40% less space than other power stations of a similar capacity.

Recharge the battery from 0% to 80% in 50 minutes when connected to AC power. That means a full battery in no time so you're never left losing power for long.

There are two 100W USB-C ports, two 15W USB-A ports, a cigarette lighter port, and four AC outlets. Recharge via an AC outlet or car charger. Or, turn it into a solar generator with a solar panel to help go off grid.

Get the Bluetti Elite 200V2 for $1,099 on the Bluetti website and Amazon. That's a 45% discount for $900 off during the Bluetti Black Friday sale.

Best for camping: Bluetti AC200L

If you need a more scalable solution, look no further than the Bluetti AC200L. It can be paired with expansion batteries like the B210, B230, and B300.

The base portable power station has a 2,048Wh capacity and 2,400W output. Recharge your MacBook Pro 31 times or power a 150W fridge for 11 hours.

This compact portable power station can fit in at your campsite and keep quiet while powering your devices. Or, you can squeeze it into your RV's utility closet with an expansion battery to keep everything running with ease while off grid.

It has four AC outlets, a NEMA TT-30 outlet, two 100W USB-C ports, and two 18W USB-A ports. Recharge the battery via AC, solar panels, or a cigarette lighter.

Best portable power station for on-the-go: Bluetti AC180

Maximize portability with the Bluetti AC180 portable power station. It's only 35.3 pounds but still packs a 1,152Wh capacity and can output 1,800W.

Bluetti AC180

Get four AC outlets, a 100W USB-C port, four 15W USB-A ports, and a cigarette lighter. It even has a 15W Qi wireless charging pad on top.

Recharge the AC180 with up to 500W solar or use AC power to recharge to 80%in 45 minutes. It can provide enough power to recharge your iPhone 62 times, run a 120W refrigerator for 7 hours, or recharge your MacBook 15 times.

Best for hurricane season: Bluetti AC300 or AC500
